Title: Establishes the small business employees loan forgiveness incentive program
Summary: Establishes the small business employees loan forgiveness incentive program for applicants who agree to engage in employment at a small business registered to do business in New York state; establishes the eligibility for such awards; establishes the amount and duration of such awards.
ActClause: AN ACT to amend the education law, in relation to creating the small business employees loan forgiveness incentive program
